gurmukhi: ਪਵਨ ਗਵਨ ਜੈਸੇ ਗੁਡੀਅਾ ੳੁਡਤ ਰਹੈ ਪਵਨ ਰਹਤ ਗੁਡੀ ੳੁਡਿ ਨ ਸਕਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Pavan Gavan Jaisay Gudeeaa Udat Rahai , Pavan Rahat Gudee Udi N Sakat Hai ?
translation: As a kite keeps aloft in the sky only if there is breeze blowing, and in the absence of breeze it drops down on the ground;

gurmukhi: ਡੋਰੀ ਕੀ ਮਰੋਰਿ ਜੈਸੇ ਲਟੂਅਾ ਫਿਰਤ ਰਹੈ ਤਾੳੁ ਹਾੳੁ ਮਿਟੈ ਗਿਰਿ ਪਰੈ ਹੁੲਿ ਥਕਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Doree Kee Marori Jaisay Latooaa Dhirat Rahai , Taau Haau Mitai Giri Parai Hui Dakat Hai ?
translation: As a top keeps revolving on its axis/spindle as long as the torque provided to it by the thread lasts, where after it drops dead;

gurmukhi: ਕੰਚਨ ਅਸੁਧ ਜਿੳੁ ਕੁਠਾਰੀ ਠਹਰਾਤ ਨਹੀ ਸੁਧ ਭੲੇ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਛਬਿ ਕੈ ਛਕਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kanchan Asudh Jiu Koutthaaree Tthaharaat Nahee , Sudh Bhaay Nihachal Chhabi Kai Chhakat Hai ?
translation: As a base gold cannot remain stable in a crucible and on becoming pure, rests and acquire glitter;

gurmukhi: ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਭ੍ਰਮਤ ਚਤੁਰ ਕੁੰਟ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ੲੇਕ ਟੇਕ ਮੋਨਿ ਨ ਬਕਤ ਹੈ ॥੯੫॥
transliteration: Duramati Doubidhaa Bhramat Chatur Kounta , Gurmati Ayk Tayk Moni N Bakat Hai ?95?
translation: So does a person roams about in all the four directions due to duality and base intelligence. But once he takes the refuge of Guru's wisdom, he acquires peace and becomes engrossed within. (95)
